experience.title: ANIMAL IMAGE CLASSIFICATION
experience.description:
BUILT A CNN SYSTEM
I split the original dataset into training, validation, and test sets
Built a CNN model using Python's TensorFlow library based on training and validation datasets.
Results:
Accuracy: Train - 94%, Validation - 96%, Test - 92%
Loss: Train - 16%, Validation - 11%
Github: https://github.com/LDKhang35/CNN

experience.title: BIRD CLASSIFICATION
experience.description:
APPLIED NAÏVE BAYES CLASSIFIER ALGORITHM (PYTHON)
Used cleaned data to identify animal groups in the dataset.
Split data into animal groups (based on features for classi cation).
Trained a Naïve Bayes Classi er on categorized bird data, and tested it with hypothetical samples.
Created hypothetical data to test the model.
Result:
Accuracy: 85.71%
Github:https://github.com/LDKhang35/NAIVE-BAYES-CLASSIFIER
